Detailed Description

A texture, an image container for drawing elements.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum ckTex::TexFormat

The texture formats.

Enumerator:
FORMAT_RGB  R8G8B8.
FORMAT_RGBA  R8G8B8A8.
FORMAT_ALPHA  A8.
FORMAT_PNG_RGB  R8G8B8 from PNG.
FORMAT_PNG_RGBA  R8G8B8A8 from PNG.
FORMAT_PNG_ALPHA  A8 from PNG.

enum ckTex::TexMode

The texture modes.

Enumerator:
MODE_READ_ONLY  Read-only.
MODE_READ_WRITE  Read and write.

MODE_FRAMEBUFFER  Copied from the framebuffer.

MODE_VOLATILE  Vram only.

Member Function Documentation

ckTex* ckTex::getPrevN (  )  const

Returns the previous texture.

If the previous texture doesn't exist, returns NULL.

void* ckTex::beginEditImage (  ) 

Starts editing the raw image of this texture.

endEditImage must be called after editing.

Returns:
The raw image of this texture.

void ckTex::endEditImage ( u16  x,
u16  y,
u16  width,
u16  height 
)

Ends editing the raw image and updates the specified area.

Parameters:
[in] x The left position of the modified area.
[in] y The top position of the modified area.
[in] width The width of the modified area.
[in] height The height of the modified area.

void ckTex::clearImage ( ckCol  col  ) 

Sets the all pixels of this texture to 0.

This method can't be called during editing the raw image.

u16  height 
)

Changes the size of this texture.

Parameters:

[in] height The height of a texture.
